tokens.resolved_gloss: seven (as the sacred full one); also (adverbially) seven times; by implication, a week; by extension, an indefinite number

tokens.resolved_gloss: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to score with a mark as a tally or record, i.e. (by implication) to inscribe, and also to enumerate; intensively, to recount, i.e. celebrate
